DOC.brief_summary: In study , investigator would like analyze bone mineral density ( BMD ) , bone turnover maker , fracture prevention effect denosumab Japanese patient clinical practice . The participant treat investigator hospital , severe osteoporotic condition . The main objective study investigate effect denosumab . The researcher also investigate effect Effects previous osteoporotic therapy denosumab treatment . DOC.detailed_description: Registry criterion : Patients treat investigator hospital use denosumab . Enrolled patient severe osteoporosis ; two previous osteoporotic fracture , low BMD ( < young adult mean 65 % ) . Interventions : blood analyse dual-energy X-ray absorptiometry ( DXA ) every 4 month Informed consent : Written inform consent obtain . Sample size : Five-hundreds participant
